Keras Models

This project was made to represent my progress in learning the keras framework. This notebook covers and explains the Sequential Model, the Functional API and further topics such as Model Subclassing and building a Model from scratch.

Cats Vs Dogs Classifier

This project was my first foray into Convolutional Neural Networks. This project creates a binary classifier to solve the problem of classifying Dogs and Cats. This uses both a custom trained CNN through data Augmentation and the VGG16 image classifier as a base for different results.

See it here
